objects.specification: A floor surface designed to resemble a rocky or prehistoric ground texture with earth tones and subtle uneven embossing that mimics ancient terrain, providing a durable and textured base for the classroom.
A smooth plastered interior wall painted in a light neutral grey color with a subtle matte finish, minimalistic in design to serve as backdrop for décor elements and dinosaur-themed displays.
A smooth plastered interior wall painted in a light neutral grey color with a subtle matte finish, minimalistic in design to serve as backdrop for décor elements and dinosaur-themed displays.

A large dinosaur-themed blackboard with a dark matte writing surface framed by rustic wooden trim, featuring decorative dinosaur silhouettes etched along the border to evoke a prehistoric atmosphere, with a slightly textured surface optimized for chalk use.

A large teacher's desk crafted from rich walnut wood with a broad rectangular tabletop and smooth polished finish, supported by sturdy tapered legs and featuring built-in drawers on one side for storage, complete with a modesty panel and rounded corner details.

A full-scale dinosaur skeleton model mounted on a discrete steel support stand, bones rendered in aged ivory color with realistic texturing and articulation highlighting vertebrae, ribs, skull, and limbs, evoking a museum-quality exhibit.

A tall dinosaur-themed bookshelf constructed from dark wood with multiple open shelves housing dinosaur books and small fossil replicas, featuring vertical side panels carved with dinosaur motifs and a durable matte finish.

A tall dinosaur-themed bookshelf constructed from dark wood with multiple open shelves housing dinosaur books and small fossil replicas, featuring vertical side panels carved with dinosaur motifs and a durable matte finish.

A tall dinosaur-themed bookshelf constructed from dark wood with multiple open shelves housing dinosaur books and small fossil replicas, featuring vertical side panels carved with dinosaur motifs and a durable matte finish.
A rectangular glass display case with transparent glass panels encased in a slim matte silver metal frame, sitting atop a matching stand and showcasing dinosaur fossils inside with interior lighting.
A rectangular glass display case with transparent glass panels encased in a slim matte silver metal frame, sitting atop a matching stand and showcasing dinosaur fossils inside with interior lighting.

A colorful world map printed on matte paper and mounted on a lightweight frame, highlighting dinosaur fossil discovery locations with icons and labels in vibrant earth tones and contrasting colors, framed by a thin wooden border.

A standard student desk crafted from dark oak wood with a rectangular tabletop and four sturdy legs, featuring a subtle wood grain finish and smooth edges, designed to seat one student comfortably with ample legroom.
